entry.title: Combined summary - Route finding
entry.summary: The post discusses the concept of neighbors of beacon nodes discovering when one of their neighbors becomes a beacon, and how this information can be efficiently propagated to other neighbors. Although the purpose of this discovery is not explicitly stated, potential applications could include tracking or monitoring devices within a network. The post does not provide further details, leaving room for interpretation.The author seeks information on how nodes can establish routes between themselves and beacon nodes. They express concerns about scalability when using floodfill search and are curious if there is a summary available regarding the latest ideas on this topic.
